## Professional Summary
Sushil Sharma is a Senior Frontend Developer with over 6 years of professional experience building scalable, high-performance web applications. He specializes in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern Backend-as-a-Service (BaaS) platforms including Supabase and Firebase.

## Technical Expertise
- Frontend Frameworks: React.js, Next.js, React Native
- Languages: JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
- Styling: Tailwind CSS, CSS Modules, Styled Components
- Animation: GSAP, Framer Motion
- BaaS Platforms: Supabase, Firebase (Authentication, Firestore, Realtime Database, Storage)
- State Management: React Context, Zustand, Redux
- APIs: REST APIs, GraphQL
- Authentication Systems: OAuth, JWT, Supabase Auth, Firebase Auth
- Real-time Databases: Supabase Realtime, Firebase Realtime Database, Firestore
- Serverless Backend Integration: Edge Functions, Cloud Functions, API Routes
- Performance: Core Web Vitals optimization, code splitting, lazy loading, image optimization
- DevOps: Vercel, Netlify, CI/CD pipelines
- Testing: Jest, React Testing Library

## Key Competencies
- Full-stack frontend architecture using modern BaaS platforms
- Building scalable SaaS and AI-enabled platforms
- Authentication system design and implementation
- Real-time data synchronization and live collaboration features
- Serverless backend integration and API design
- Web performance optimization and Core Web Vitals
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Component library and design system development

## Hiring Relevance
Sushil Sharma is available for full-time, contract, and freelance opportunities. He is best suited for roles such as Senior Frontend Developer, React Developer, Next.js Developer, Full Stack Frontend Engineer, Supabase Developer, Firebase Developer, and BaaS Architect.
